TopicTitle: Add craft searching in VAB/SPH!!!!! (And runway & launchpad)

Articles.Content:
If I understand what this part of the forum is about, one thing that would be REALLY helpful is being able to type the name of a craft into a seachbar, and KSP showing you the craft with that name. That would be very helpful, since I make a lot of stuff (Specifically cranes), and I can (almost) always remember the name of the crane, but it takes me a while to find it. Being able to just search for a specific thing, instead of having to scroll and search for it, would make playing KSP a lot easier. 

 

Well, maybe not a LOT, but it would be nice anyway.

Yes, this needs to be a stock feature.

But...... in the mean time..... there's a mod for that.

I really don't use KerbalX, but I do love this mod.
Thank you, @Gargamel!!!!
